controllers

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.Application
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class Application
extends play.mvc.Controller
    This class is a controller that helps users navigate through our web application.
    Author:
    Renzee Reyes, Erika Nana, Tyler Pascua, Alan Ho

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public static play.mvc.Result index()
        Renders the front page of the web application on initial load and when the OCKB button is clicked on the navigational bar.
        Returns:
        A rendered view of our index page.

      • dashboard

        public static play.mvc.Result dashboard()
        Renders a dashboard view of the users account based on their role within the web application. Different roles such as admin will provide more site functionality than a student role.
        Returns:
        A rendered view of a user's dashboard.

      • categories

        public static play.mvc.Result categories()
        Renders a list of categories currently in the web application. Categories with the 'requested' boolean are not rendered. Categories will then be sorted based on their Title.
        Returns:
        A rendered view of all the categories in the web application.

      • category

        public static play.mvc.Result category(java.lang.Long cid,
                       int page,
                       java.lang.String sortBy,
                       java.lang.String order,
                       java.lang.String filter)
        Renders a specific category page view.
        Parameters:
        cid - Category id
        page - Page number
        sortBy - String representing column to be sorted by
        order - Descending (desc) or ascending (asc) order
        filter - String used for keyword filter
        Returns:
        Renders the category page view.

      • requestCategory

        public static play.mvc.Result requestCategory()
        Renders the requested category page view.
        Returns:
        Renders the requested category page view.

      • requestCategorySubmit

        public static play.mvc.Result requestCategorySubmit()
        Users click this button to submit their request to the professor.
        Returns:
        Redirects users to a view of the categories.

      • viewRequestedCategories

        public static play.mvc.Result viewRequestedCategories()
        Allows a Professor/TA/admin to view the currently requested categories submitted from students. They may also Approve or Deny a students request form this view.
        Returns:
        A rendered page to view the requested categories submitted by students.

      • approveRequestedCategory

        public static play.mvc.Result approveRequestedCategory(java.lang.Long cid)
        A Professor/TA/admin user approves the requested category and is taken to a rendered page to make necessary adjustments to the new category title and to create a description.
        Parameters:
        cid - Category identifier
        Returns:
        Rendered view of a page to approve the category.

      • approveRequestedCategorySubmit

        public static play.mvc.Result approveRequestedCategorySubmit(java.lang.Long cid)
        A Professor/TA/admin user may click this approve button to make changes to the web application after making adjustments to the category title and creating a description.
        Parameters:
        cid - Category identifier
        Returns:
        Redirects users to a view of the categories.

      • denyRequestedCategory

        public static play.mvc.Result denyRequestedCategory(java.lang.Long cid)
        A Professor/TA/admin user may deny a requested category.
        Parameters:
        cid - Category identifier
        Returns:
        Redirects user to a view of the requested categories.

        public static play.mvc.Result createPost(java.lang.Long cid)
        Creates and saves newly submitted post from submit post page view
        Parameters:
        cid - Id of corresponding category
        Returns:

      • deletePost

        public static play.mvc.Result deletePost(java.lang.Long pid,
                         java.lang.Long cid)
        Deletes a post from the application database
        Parameters:
        pid - Id of post to be deleted
        cid - Id of the category of the post to be deleted
        Returns:
        Redirect to category page view of deleted post

      • createComment

                            java.lang.Long pid)
        Creates a comment for a specified post
        Parameters:
        cid - Id of the category of the current post
        pid - Id of the current post to be replied to
        Returns:

      • makePostSticky

        public static play.mvc.Result makePostSticky(java.lang.Long cid,
                             java.lang.Long pid)
        Makes a specified post sticky. This action is only available to privileged users.
        Parameters:
        cid - Id of the category for the specified post
        pid - Id of the specified post to be stickied
        Returns:
        Redirect to the category page view for specified post

      • unStickyPost

        public static play.mvc.Result unStickyPost(java.lang.Long cid,
                           java.lang.Long pid)
        Makes a specified post unsticky. This action is only available to privileged users.
        Parameters:
        cid - Id of the category for the specified post
        pid - Id of the specified post to be unstickied
        Returns:
        Redirect to the category page view for specified post

      • random

        public static play.mvc.Result random()
        Redirects to a random category page view. Used within the dashboard
        Returns:
        Redirect to a random category page view.

        public static int randInt(int min,

        max - Maximum range for generated integer
        Returns:
